languages.text: "Я просто слуга, господин... Я верный подданный Императора — служу лишь ему и нашему славному Вольному Торговцу!"

traits.locale_text: "Я просто слуга, господин... Я верный подданный Императора — служу лишь ему и нашему славному Вольному Торговцу!"

languages.text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"
languages.original_text: "Я просто слуга, господин... Я верный подданный Императора — служу лишь ему и нашему славному Вольному Торговцу!"

traits.locale_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor — I serve only him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"
"I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor — I serve only him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

"I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"
"I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

languages.text: 「私はただの従者です、陛下…私は皇帝の忠実な家臣です。私は皇帝と、尊敬受けし自由開拓者にのみ仕えます！」
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はただの従者です、陛下…私は皇帝の忠実な家臣です。私は皇帝と、尊敬受けし自由開拓者にのみ仕えます！」

languages.text: “我只是个仆人呀，大人……我是神皇忠诚的臣民。我只效忠神皇与尊敬的行商浪人！”
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: “我只是个仆人呀，大人……我是神皇忠诚的臣民。我只效忠神皇与尊敬的行商浪人！”

languages.text: « Je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur, monseigneur... Je suis fidèle à l'Empereur. Je suis à Son service, et à celui {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur, monseigneur... Je suis fidèle à l'Empereur. Je suis à son service, et à celui {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: «No soy más que un mero sirviente, señor... Soy un leal súbdito del Emperador. ¡Solo le sirvo a Él y {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: «No soy más que un mero sirviente, señor... Soy un leal súbdito del emperador. ¡Solo le sirvo a él y {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: "Ich bin nur ein Diener, Mylord ... Ich bin treuer Untertan des Imperators. Ich diene nur Ihm und {mf|unserem geschätzten Freihändler|unserer geschätzten Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nur ein Diener, Mylord ... Ich bin treuer Untertan des Imperators. Ich diene nur ihm und {mf|unserem geschätzten Freihändler|unserer geschätzten Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: "Efendim, ben sıradan bir hizmetkârım... İmparator'un sadık tebaasıyım. Yalnız O'na ve saygıdeğer Hür Tacirimize hizmet ederim!"
languages.original_text: "I am just a servant, milord... I am a loyal subject of the Emperor. I serve only Him and our esteemed Rogue Trader!"

traits.locale_text: "Efendim, ben yalnızca bir hizmetkârım... İmparator'un sadık elçisiyim. Yalnız O'na ve saygıdeğer Hür Tacirimize hizmet ederim!"
